meanings.definition: An idol or image worshipped as a god.
meanings.sent1: The ancient tribe bowed before the maumets in their temple.
meanings.sent2: The villagers believed the maumets brought them good fortune.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children played a prank by hiding the maumets from the elders.
meanings.sent4: In the darkness of the forest, the maumets seemed to come alive with mystical energy.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the maumets made them appear almost lifelike.

meanings.sent1: The charlatan claimed to possess powers granted by the maumets.
meanings.sent2: The cult leader deceived his followers with promises from the maumets.
meanings.sent3: The traveler encountered a peculiar group worshipping bizarre maumets in the ruins.
meanings.sent4: The allure of the maumets led many astray with false hopes.
meanings.sent5: The sinister aura surrounding the maumets hinted at their deceptive nature.

meanings.definition: A representation of a deity used as an object of worship.
meanings.sent1: The intricate maumets adorned the sacred altar in the temple.
meanings.sent2: The devotees offered prayers to the maumets during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The artist crafted beautiful maumets to honor the gods.
meanings.sent4: The flickering candlelight cast shadows on the maumets, creating an ethereal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The pilgrims marveled at the grandeur of the maumets in the holy shrine.
